description: Gets summary information about all or the specified data lifecycle policies. To get complete information about a policy, use GetLifecyclePolicy.

parameters.name: PolicyIds
parameters.description: The identifiers of the data lifecycle policies. (string) ---

parameters.name: TargetTags
parameters.description: The target tag for a policy. Tags are strings in the format key=value. (string) ---

parameters.name: TagsToAdd
parameters.description: The tags to add to objects created by the policy. Tags are strings in the format key=value. These user-defined tags are added in addition to the Amazon Web Services-added lifecycle tags. (string) ---

parameters.name: DefaultPolicyType
parameters.description: [Default policies only] Specifies the type of default policy to get. Specify one of the following: VOLUME - To get only the default policy for EBS snapshots INSTANCE - To get only the default policy for EBS-backed AMIs ALL - To get all default policies.

nested_items.name: Policies
nested_items.description: Summary information about the lifecycle policies.

nested_items.name: PolicyId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the lifecycle policy.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the lifecycle policy.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The activation state of the lifecycle policy.

nested_items.name: PolicyType
nested_items.description: The type of policy. EBS_SNAPSHOT_MANAGEMENT indicates that the policy manages the lifecycle of Amazon EBS snapshots. IMAGE_MANAGEMENT indicates that the policy manages the lifecycle of EBS-backed AMIs. EVENT_BASED_POLICY indicates that the policy automates cross-account snapshot copies for snapshots that are shared with your account.

nested_items.name: DefaultPolicy
nested_items.description: [Default policies only] The type of default policy. Values include:
VOLUME - Default policy for EBS snapshots.
INSTANCE - Default policy for EBS-backed AMIs.
